```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
library(lubridate)

theme_set(theme_light())

data("mpg")

mpg %>% ggplot(
  aes(x=displ,
      y=hwy,
      color=class
     ) 
)+
  geom_point()+
  facet_wrap(~cyl, nrow=2)
```
```{r}

#Graph 2
mpg %>% ggplot(
  aes(x=class,
      y=hwy)
)+
  geom_col()+
  coord_flip()


mpg %>% ggplot(
  aes(x=class,
      y=hwy)
)+
  geom_boxplot()
  


```
